articles.title: UK secures two million more doses of Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine - Reuters
articles.description: Britain has secured two million doses of Moderna Inc's COVID-19 vaccine candidate, to be available in Europe as early as the spring, the government said on Sunday, in addition to the 5 million doses it secured from the U.S. company two weeks ago.
